LanguageData.AM_MaddeningChantOutcome.description: If the incantation ritual goes well (positive outcome) it will provide a mood bonus and cause mental breaks. A negative outcome will have no effect except a mood penalty.
The {0} was rational and sane! What was that? There was no shared insanity, no cackling forbidden whispers of madness. What a bore.
The {0} was suitably deranged. One person's craziness is another person's reality.
The {0} was psychotic. There's a fine line between genius and insanity. We have erased this line.
The {0} was thoroughly insane! Sweet, crazy conversations full of half sentences, daydreams and misunderstandings more thrilling than understanding could ever be.
LanguageData.AM_MaddeningChantOutcome.comps.0.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.AM_MaddeningChantOutcome.comps.1.label: кількість учасників
LanguageData.AM_MaddeningChantOutcome.comps.2.label: {PAWN_labelShort}'s social impact
